ada4d7b2-52ce-4ae4-96c1-b16321a1ee1c.content: Outdoor shot of a small shop building, there's a sign that says "Pokemon Breeding Center" across the top and many animal care items can be seen in the front windows.

a56ab2b5-624e-4b21-a85a-da7ad7be576b.content: Indoor shot of the Eevee pen main area, we see several Eevee's running around happy and playful.

1761a1e7-7c21-4bad-914a-63eb64086999.content: Switch perspectives to a shadowy spot away from the others, we see our protagonist from the back silhouette, they're watching the others play from afar.

3903c1e1-9b75-417e-8d92-c6eed775afae.content:
- Jay is at the starting position at the base of the climbing trees, facing up.

- Other generic Eevee (Siblings) are running in small circles chasing one another. (Can give the sprites small color variations)

[Wait]

- Iye approaches the player from the food bowl area [left?] (if this is visible then he's eating there, if not he just comes from that direction)

051eb73d-d381-420e-b49e-a97e3403dc71.content:
- Linsey enters the pen with another human character who is much younger. She calls for all the Eevee to gather around.

- Stop playing and gather around the new human.

- The two run off to hide, knowing that this human is here to take one of them away.

7e56f531-1c7e-45f2-a3da-0eeb6a144232.content: Human from that day holding an Eevee in their arms grinning as they leave out the front door of the center

fa700f16-e45c-477e-9b7f-df24b9633b3d.content: Night shot of the center from the perspective of the Eevee pen

e62e3d24-9e2a-4296-baa7-5e641712e3cb.content: Have a day shot of the pen with Eevee’s silhouetted

e9607d73-a042-442a-8c15-746f8458212c.content: And one by one each image has one less Eevee

84c9b755-ac1d-45a2-9af3-dc3f97e8f77f.content: Up close shot of Iye being picked up, him wiggling and trying to get away and Jay looking distressed

e162d637-874a-4c27-bf62-b6b9b8b635ba.content: Free-roam inside the Eevee Pen (the sleeping area is not accessible)

abdc6ace-af4a-4f49-9d50-3ae261f78ae8.content:
- Linsey enters the pen with another human character who is much younger. She calls for Jay in a very defeated tone.

- After a moment they path to the players location.

b9090ff2-f35c-41d7-a7f4-405b656a76a0.content: The player has full control and can attempt to run away from the two. The longer this goes on the faster they move. This chase is unwinnable and ends when the player is caught.

95439899-8fd6-4faf-93b3-6bbeb63879d9.content: Jay baring his teeth in an aggressive stance

9e275918-fa41-4b8c-90c5-151d3262e3e3.content: Child recoiling, tears forming in their eyes, Lindsey on the side looking pinching the bridge of her nose and looking like this is the last straw

b47ac154-93a9-4774-b519-de391dc5535a.content: Night scene of the pen from before, but we see Linsey shadowed in the background heading towards the sleeping area

3b437702-156b-43ad-93a7-c9990eebe101.content: We see a sleeping Jay, curled up and content with a shadow looming over them.

0765424c-4f5e-411e-8e1b-055861c415fd.content: Back to the pen scene, we see Linsey again but this time holding a box and heading towards the door

9ae594e4-69c5-4a03-8d67-1fd740215ef0.title: Map Cutscene 1
9ae594e4-69c5-4a03-8d67-1fd740215ef0.content:
Breeding Center

[

Jay @ PlayerStart,

Siblings <-> RunInCircles

]

[Wait 8s]

[Iye > GoToPlayer]

99142c43-1b40-461d-ba30-248c0ef13956.title: Dialogue 1
99142c43-1b40-461d-ba30-248c0ef13956.content:
Iye : Hey, they kick you out of tag again?

Jay : No, I left! They won't listen to me about the humans.

Iye : Maybe it's because they're just trying to have fun?

Jay : How can they run around having fun when at any moment a human could come in here and take one of us away?!

Iye : Would you rather they hide and be scared all the time? Let them have fun Jay, they don't want to think about where the humans take us or what happens after that.

Jay : You don't understand! Dee came back yesterday, I saw her and that human that took her away up in the front! She didn't have fur anymore, her skin was all blue and she had fins, like a fish. She's a fish, Iye! The humans turned her into a fish!

Iye : Whoa… That's freaky…

Jay : Yeah, and you know what Em said when I told them all what I saw?! “Cool!” Can you believe it?!

Iye : I don't want some human to grab me and turn me into a fish… But what can we do about it? We can't stop them, can we?

Jay : I... I don't know...

Iye : We need to come up with a plan, even if it's just us, okay? Say, let's play a quick card game, that always helps me calm down and think.

Jay : Hmmm, okay. I guess it can't hurt.

937a21d8-5cd0-40e2-b3df-180cf04461db.title: Guessing Game

9008fca8-a82b-4ead-9e2f-aaceea21c0dd.title: Climbing Tree
9008fca8-a82b-4ead-9e2f-aaceea21c0dd.content: Nice and tall, perfect for keeping a lookout. I can see the whole store from up there.

259b5682-66d5-4bd5-8746-66ce19f9e74c.title: Toys
259b5682-66d5-4bd5-8746-66ce19f9e74c.content: My siblings used to play with these all the time. I just don't see the point.

4187ff44-79db-4fbf-8d52-a7103693d4c7.title: Covered Hole
4187ff44-79db-4fbf-8d52-a7103693d4c7.content: I'm not allowed in the sleeping area until closing time. I'd never stay out here otherwise.

edf1a449-7e0b-4164-b750-4354f46a15f7.title: Map Cutscene 3
edf1a449-7e0b-4164-b750-4354f46a15f7.content:
[Linsey (Human) > Enters Pen]

[Wait 5s]

[Linsey (Human) > Jay]

e6612f56-f756-4428-8d4f-fd19dbb2cce7.title: Map Cutscene 2
e6612f56-f756-4428-8d4f-fd19dbb2cce7.content:
Breeding Center

[Linsey (Human) > Enters Pen]

[Wait 3s]

[Siblings > Gather around Linsey]

[Wait 3s]

[Iye & Jay > To Sleeping Area]

a539efc1-6145-4c9c-a46f-25f2f60dce9b.title: Dialogue 2
a539efc1-6145-4c9c-a46f-25f2f60dce9b.content:
Jay : This is so frustrating! Why does she keep bringing them here?!

Iye : I don't know, they should just leave us alone. We don't want to be fish or anything else!

Jay : Yeah, we're great just the way we are! We're not going to change for any dumb human!

Iye : Never, promise?

Jay : Of course! Promise!

0d107559-2e43-4c3e-a2fb-eab347f0d8f8.script: visits(climbing_tree) && visits(toys) && visits(covered_hole)

value.data:
Shy and standoffish, they have strong opinions that they usually keep to themselves. One thing they are very open about is their hatred of evolution. He has only really been close with their sibling Iye, who taught them how to do card battles. When Iye was adopted Jay stopped playing games entirely out of sadness (and lack of a partner to play against). 

When they are forced into the wild they quickly encounter the card games again and are reminded of Iye. Deciding to seek them out (convinced they must have escaped or something) they hear of a card game tournament and know that Iye couldn't pass up going to something like that. So they set off to the tournament in the big city.

The Manager of the Eevee Breeding Center. She gives trainers their Starter Pokemon as well as their first pack of Battle Cards. Seeing that Jay is the last remaining Eevee of the litter and his aggression towards trainers she is forced to make the tough decision to set him loose so that a new batch of Eevee can be bred.
Group of 4 Eevee from the same litter as Iye and Jay

Jay's sibling, he's competitive and a little overbearing at times. He really loves playing games with others and isn't above tricking others into doing what he wants to do. His favorite thing is card battles. He also has very strong opinions that evolving is the worst thing ever, something that he and Jay agreed on instantly and kick-started their bond. He was adopted before the start of the game but we see him as an Eevee in the introduction flashback tutorial.
